revisions.rev: {{Infobox software | name = Lintian | latest release version = 2.3.3 | operating_system = [[Linux]] | license = [[GNU General Public License]] | website = http://lintian.debian.org/ }} '''Lintian''' is a helper tool used in conjunction with [[dpkg]], the [[Debian]] [[package management system]]. It checks Debian [[Software package (installation)|software packages]] for common inconsistencies and errors. As of 3/5/2010, the latest version complies to Debian standards version 3.8.3. A Lintian check file is often required before a package is uploaded to a distribution's core repository. Linda was another application that was intended to overcome many difficulties with lintian. It was written in [[Python (programming language)|Python]] and was faster than current versions of Lintian. However, Lintian was better known and underwent many fixes to overcome past difficulties.[http://lists.debian.org/debian-devel-announce/2008/03/msg00009.html Misc development news (#5)] ==See also== {{Portal|Free software}} *[[dpkg]] *[[deb (file format)]] *[[Debian build toolchain]] *[[lint (software)|lint]], the original C language source code analysis program (Lintian is not based on lint source code) ==References== ==External links== * [http://lintian.debian.org/ Official website] [[Category:Dpkg]] {{Install-software-stub}} [[pl:Lintian]]
